mapper.sql: id, create_time, email, password, phone, realname, salt, status, username, org_id, parent_id, address, identity_cards,(select count(1) from security_user oo where oo.parent_id = nn.id) as nodes
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from security_user nn
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into security_user (id, create_time, email, password, phone, realname, salt, status, username, org_id, parent_id, address, identity_cards) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCards,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
